properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM TB_MESSAGE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NO2 = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT M.MESSAGE_NO , B.USER_ID , B.USER_NICK , M.MESSAGE_CONTENT , M.MESSAGE_DATE , M.USER_NO , M.USER_NO2
FROM TB_MESSAGE M JOIN TB_MEMBER B ON(M.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND (M.USER_NO2 = ?) ORDER BY M.MESSAGE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
